  File: wizard/pain_level_view.xml
  Content:
```
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<odoo>

    <record id="view_acs_pain_level_form" model="ir.ui.view">
        <field name="name">Pain Level Diagram</field>
        <field name="model">acs.pain.level</field>
        <field name="arch" type="xml">
            <form string="Pain Level Diagram">
                <group>
                    <group>
                        <img src="acs_hms/static/src/img/pain_scale_chart.jpg" alt="Pain Level Diagram" class="pull-left" height="450"/>
                    </group>
                    <group>
                        <div colspan="2">
                            <br/>
                            <span>10 - Unspeakable pain. Bedridden and possibly despanrious. Very few people will ever experience this level of pain.</span><br/>
                            <span>9 - Excruciating pain. Unable to converse. Crying out and/or moaning uncontrollably.</span><br/>
                            <span>8 - Intense pain. Physical activity is severely spanmited. Conversing requires great effort.</span><br/>
                            <span>7 - Severe pain that dominates your senses and significantly spanmits your abispanty to perform normal daily activities or maintain social relationships. Interferes with sleep.</span><br/>
                            <span>6 - Moderately strong pain that interferes with normal daily activities. Difficulty concentrating.</span><br/>
                            <span>5 - Moderately strong pain. It can’t be ignored for more than a few minutes, but with effort you still can manage to work or participate in some social activities.</span><br/>
                            <span>4 - Moderate pain. If you are deeply involved in an activity, it can be ignored for a period of time, but is still distracting.</span>
                            <span>3 - Pain is noticeable and distracting, however, you can get used to it and adapt.</span><br/>
                            <span>2 - Minor pain. Annoying and may have occasional stronger twinges.</span><br/>
                            <span>1 - Pain is very mild, barely noticeable. Most of the time you don’t think about it.</span><br/>
                            <span>0 - Pain Free.</span>
                        </div>
                    </group>
                </group>
            </form>
        </field>
    </record>

    <record id="action_acs_pain_level" model="ir.actions.act_window">
        <field name="name">Pain Level</field>
        <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field>
        <field name="res_model">acs.pain.level</field>
        <field name="view_mode">form</field>
        <field name="target">new</field>
    </record>

</odoo>
```

  File: wizard/reschedule_appointments.py
  Content:
```
# coding: utf-8

from odoo import models, api, fields
from datetime import date, datetime, timedelta


class AcsRescheduleAppointments(models.TransientModel):
    _name = 'acs.reschedule.appointments'
    _description = "Reschedule Appointments"

    acs_reschedule_time = fields.Float(string="Reschedule Selected Appointments by (Hours)", required=True)

    def acs_reschedule_appointments(self):
        appointments = self.env['hms.appointment'].search([('id','in',self.env.context.get('active_ids'))])
        #ACS: do it in method only to use that method for notifications.
        appointments.acs_reschedule_appointments(self.acs_reschedule_time)

```

  File: wizard/reschedule_appointments_view.xml
  Content:
```
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<odoo>

    <record id="view_acs_reschedule_appointments_form" model="ir.ui.view">
        <field name="name">acs.reschedule.appointments.form</field>
        <field name="model">acs.reschedule.appointments</field>
        <field name="arch" type="xml">
            <form string="Reschedule Appointments">
                <group>
                    <field name="acs_reschedule_time" widget="float_time"/>
                </group>
                <footer>
                    <button name="acs_reschedule_appointments" string="Reschedule All Selected Appointments" type="object" class="btn-primary" confirm="Are you sure that you want to reschedule all selected appointments? it will add given hours to current scheduled time, means if current time is 1 PM and you add 2 hours it will be 3 PM after Rescheduling."/>
                    <button string="Cancel" class="btn-secondary" special="cancel" />
                </footer>
            </form>
        </field>
    </record>

    <record id="action_acs_reschedule_appointments" model="ir.actions.act_window">
        <field name="name">Reschedule Appointments</field>
        <field name="type">ir.actions.act_window</field>
        <field name="res_model">acs.reschedule.appointments</field>
        <field name="binding_model_id" ref="acs_hms.model_hms_appointment"/>
        <field name="view_mode">form</field>
        <field name="target">new</field>
    </record>

</odoo>

```
